name: Sky King (couch pvp // gamepads required)
description:
^ FULL SCREEN RECOMMENDED ^

// GAME IS IN DEVELOPMENT.  FEEDBACK ENCOURAGED! :D //

-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

  • *** Gamepads Required To Play ***
  • 2-4 Players 
  • Objective:  shoot down other players and be first to get 15 points
  • Tips: screen wraps left to right, flying too high causes a stall, ground kills you
  • Controls:

Music by: Heatley Bros "Choose Your Fighter"
